AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skaven engineer. Spending most of [PAWN_objective] time crafting various weapons and constructions to aid the clan; or fighting on the battlefields with their various contraptions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scribe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skaven scribe. Of the little history that is stored in the Underempire, [PAWN_nameDef] handles most of it. [PAWN_pronoun] also handles counts of various things for the clan, such as breeding numbers, gold counts, troop counts, and more.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: seer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a highly regarded seer. Serving their master, the seers take part in every move of the underempire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] belongs to one of the thousands of clans scattered throughout the underempire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: former slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a slave, but now [PAWN_nameDef] has risen to join one of the many clans throughout the underempire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gladiator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] fought frequently in the skaven arenas, and was good enough that [PAWN_pronoun] lived to fight another day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: runner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] runs errands, and does the dirty work of the clan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: marksman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natrual crack-shot with the crossbow. [PAWN_pronoun] has survived numerous battles by staying on the sideline with the crossbow, laying waste to enemies, and an occasion skaven competitor as well.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows all the ins and out of skaven society, and lives more than just a good life in the burrows.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: former clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be part of a ruined clan. Later [PAWN_pronoun] was consigned to life as a slave rat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ambitious slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has not given up on life, and dreams of climbing the ranks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: consigned slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a slave for a long time. History in the eye of a skaven is short, and [PAWN_objective] own history is as short if not shorter.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gladiator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is known for fighting in the arena, due to having shown good prowess at the fighting arts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: courier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a courier for one of the higher clans. Delivering messages, and doing dirty work has given [PAWN_objective] much mixed experience.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is of the lowest of the lowest. A struggeling rat trying to scrape by in a harsh world where the strong rule.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: former scribe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once of a higher standing, working as a scribe for one of the clans.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Tailkisser
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natrual at pleasing those with more power. [PAWN_pronoun] has survived by always being able to provide what those immediately above [PAWN_objective] want.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fervent believer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very devoted to the Great Horned Rat. [PAWN_pronoun] lives and breathes [PAWN_objective] faith, and will do anything to please the Great One.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scurvy rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the mangy cutthroats of Clan Skurvy, a clan famous for it's vast Clanfleets and habits of piracy. Even far from shore, [PAWN_nameDef] puts their skills obtained from years at sea to good use.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mors rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Clan Mors warriors stand out in Skavendom by having a strange, innate sense of 'loyalty.' Their bizarre solidarity and unity makes rats like [PAWN_nameDef] stand out from other warriors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rictus clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Clan Rictus thrives within the infamous Dark Lands, one of the least hospitable places imaginable. Skaven like [PAWN_nameDef] who filled Rictus' ranks channel that same resilience and drive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scruten clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Long ago, Seerlord Kritislik led Clan Scruten away from Skavenblight, establishing distant hidden warrens to establish his own personal army. [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of this secretive clan, receiving rare and expensive equipment as the Grey Seers grant the clan special treatment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: night runner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Night Runners like [PAWN_nameDef] make up the bulk of Clan Eshin's military. They stand out from most clanrats by receiving a rudimentary training in the fighting styles learned from Cathay. Exceptional Night Runners might be promoted to the rank of Nightleader, guiding their own pack into battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nightleader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] proved [PAWN_possessive] worth as a Night Runner, becoming promoted to the rank of Nightleader. [PAWN_pronoun] once led [PAWN_possessive] personal unit of Night Runners into battle, though [PAWN_pronoun] seems unwilling to talk about what happened afterward.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gutter runner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Gutter Runners make up the third tier of Eshin's elite ranks. Like [PAWN_possessive] peers, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the Art Of Silent Death, and forged into a deadly assassin-in-training.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: death runner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Having nearly mastered the Art Of Silent Death, [PAWN_nameDef] became one of the most elite Gutter Runners in [PAWN_possessive] pack, earning the title of Death Runner. Soon [PAWN_pronoun] will join the ranks of Eshin's elite Assassins, or die trying.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Eshin assassin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] mastered the Art Of Silent Death long ago. After years of training, [PAWN_pronoun] was finally ready to undetake Clan Eshin's highest tier of training. Days later [PAWN_pronoun] was given the rank of Assassin, representing the pinnacle of Skaven physiology and discipline.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warlord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the ruthless and tyrannical rulers of [PAWN_possessive] clan. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded respect through sheer physical prowess, ruthless tyranny, and inhumane cruelty. [PAWN_pronoun] seems to have somehow fallen out of that position.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plague monk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Constantly afflicted by plague, pox, and pus, the fervent ranks of the Plague Monks of Clan Pestilens solace in their constant pain. [PAWN_nameDef] is one such monk, zealously charging into the fray with [PAWN_possessive] clanmates, seemingly immune to pain.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a clan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: born in slavery
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a slave, but managed to prove [PAWN_objective]self and climb the social ladder.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: taken as a seer candidate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from birth to be trained as a seer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a clan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sly child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with an innate sneakiness that surpassed even other skaven. Sneaking and slinking came natural, and were useful skill that became well practiced in the burrows.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: born in slavery
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a slave, and intended to work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: born in slavery
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a slave, and intended to work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a clan, and taken decent care of.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Jack of all Trades
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had an innate ability to get by, doing whatever was needed to survive and thrive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: foul smelling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Since the day [PAWN_nameDef] was borne they have possessed a revolting odor that even other skaven find repulsive. The others often made [PAWN_nameDef] sleep outside the warren, away from them, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to cultivate mushrooms.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warp tainted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed near a large deposit of warpstone which caused [PAWN_objective] to grow a malformed vestigial hand from [PAWN_possessive] stomach. It's a nice hand... sometimes.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warp twisted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent their youth as a slave in a mine suffused with warpstone. As the other slaves died around [PAWN_objective] from their horrible mutations, [PAWN_nameDef] was surprisingly tough, and was one of the few to leave the mines alive. To this day [PAWN_pronoun] still bears the warped reminders of [PAWN_possessive] time in those green lit mines.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: temple thief
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as an initiate in a night runner gang in the distant east. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] pack of murderous night thieves would spend most evenings sneaking into the guarded temples to steal supplies for their leader.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rat catcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] learned from a young age how to train and breed the giant rats that skaven often use for waste and corpse disposal. The most vicious giant rats are groomed as attack hounds and sold for a good price to claw leaders.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: thing-stabber
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always loved to kill-kill all the things. Man-things, dwarf-things, even elf-things. [PAWN_nameDef] dreams of killing an elf-thing one day, but they are so rare.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: musky
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been skittish and afraid of [PAWN_possessive] own shadow. At the first sign of danger [PAWN_pronoun] sprays the musk of fear, and runs as fast as [PAWN_pronoun] can away from danger.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mangy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always had a bad skin condition that made [PAWN_possessive] fur matted and scabrous in large patches. It's so bad that whenever [PAWN_nameDef] tries to cook something [PAWN_pronoun] always ends up getting flakes of scab or strands of hair in the meal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: skryer slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave in a clan Skryer workshop where [PAWN_pronoun] picked up some knowledge in the esoteric machines of the skaven. The warlock engineer that ran the workshop used [PAWN_nameDef] not only as a useful laborer, but also as a test subject in bizarre experiments. As result, most animals won't go near [PAWN_nameDef].
